entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gaspé
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:06 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gaspé Airport 01:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: ESE 18 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Amount 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
